text: Incompetence is the inability to perform; lack of competence; ineptitude. Aspects of incompetence include: *Administrative incompetence, dysfunctional administrative behaviors that hinder attainment of organization goals *Incompetence (law), a person not of sound mind or mentally impaired, unable to make decisions for himself or herself *Military incompetence, failures of members of the military *Social ineptitude Incompetence may also refer to: *Incompetence (geology), weakness in rocks *Incompetence (novel), a comedy novel published in 2003 by Red Dwarf co-creator Rob Grant ==See also== *Competence (disambiguation) *Darwin Awards, a tongue-in-cheek "award" given to people whose incompetence results in their death or loss of ability to reproduce *Parody, a form of humor that often employs feigned incompetence *Peter principle, tendency for a person to rise to his or her level of incompetence *Dunning–Kruger effect, the tendency for incompetent people to grossly overestimate their skills
title: Incompetence
